Yes, he's great in this movie! My favorite part of the movie is the washed up pop star who keeps forgetting the lyrics to his own songs haha. And two porn stars who fall in love! It's irreverent but very wholesome at the same time. Enjoy the movie!
Thank you - I accept!
By the way, I hope you have a Merry Christmas and that you get to watch the movie with loved ones around! P.S. it might not be very kid-friendly, but you've already seen it so I'm sure you know that
Backatcha! I definitely will see it again, thanks!
Have a great day :)
